EmailTemplate.name: GST Webinar Series_9th August
EmailTemplate.subject: GST Webinar Series ll Reserve your place NOW
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to Intuit QuickBooks!
Get GST Ready with QuickBooks!
Dear {!Contact.Name}, Thank you for exploring QuickBooks, the world’s #1 online accounting software for Business Owners. We bring to you a special live webinar for GST on 25th May 2017 understanding the impact of GST on your business. We will also show you our GST ready solution and demonstrate how easily you can transition to GST when it rolls out, create GST compliant invoices and generate return ready GST return reports.
Topic Date and Time Book Your Seat
QuickBooks GST Webinar 25 May 2017 2:00 PM to 3:30 PM IST Register for Webinar
We would also recommend you to visit the QuickBooks GST Center, where you’ll find all the relevant information and latest updates about GST provided by an expert panel of CAs. If you ever get stuck with QuickBooks anytime during your subscription, feel free to reach us. We're here to help.
Here are a bunch of ways for you to get in touch with us
QuickBooks support Visit now
Call us 1800 102 5599*
Live community Ask a question
Webinars Register now
We hope you would find QuickBooks helpful in running your business. Have an awesome day! Team QuickBooks Call us : 1800 102 5599
*Mon to Sat 9:30 am - 6:00 pm Intuit respects your privacy. To learn more, read our Privacy Statement. © Intuit India Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
